description: The National Weather Service has issued a winter weather advisory for a nine-county area of northeast Indiana and northwest Ohio, including Allen County, from overnight tonight until midday...
title: Winter weather advisory: Allen, Adams, Huntington, Wabash, Wells, Whitley, Defiance, Mercer, Paulding, Van Wert
title_page: Winter weather advisory: Allen, Adams, Huntington, Wabash, Wells, Whitley, Defiance, Mercer, Paulding, Van Wert
maintext:
The National Weather Service has issued a winter weather advisory for a nine-county area of northeast Indiana and northwest Ohio, including Allen County, from overnight tonight until midday Wednesday.
In most of the area south and east of Fort Wayne, the advisory is in effect from 3 to 10 a.m. Wednesday, calling for 1 to 3 inches of snow and a light glaze of ice.
The weather service said slippery roads could affect the Wednesday morning commute in the area, which includes Allen, Adams, Huntington, Wabash, Wells and Whitley counties in Indiana and Defiance, Paulding and Van Wert counties in Ohio.
A separate advisory for Mercer County, Ohio, is in effect from midnight tonight until noon Wednesday, and calls for 2 to 4 inches of snow and a light glaze of ice.
